name: Bob (Narosenla Longkumer)
description:
The development of this game has been in hault
 due to lack of artist and designer for making
own personal sprites and tilesets.

Currently, all the artwork and music 
are taken from open sources websites.

That being said,
Thanks for trying out this game!

Arrrow for movements.

Space for Jump.

X for punch.

Note: I have started working on this game again after learning myself some digital art B) .
